thread.section_title: Antique Lamp Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Antique Lamp Supply | antiquelampsupply.com
thread.title: JEREMIAH HUTH
thread.title_full: Antique Lamp Supply reviewed by JEREMIAH HUTH

author: JEREMIAH HUTH
title: JEREMIAH HUTH
text: Product did not fit as customer service described. I tried to double check with them, but did not receive a response to several further emails. I figured Id take a gamble, and turns out it was a bad bet. The shipping for returns was not worth my money, so I ate the cost and just kept the product.
